Mega-Linter configuration

Type: object

Mega-Linter configuration file

 No Additional Properties

root ADDITIONAL_EXCLUDED_DIRECTORIES
Type: array of string

List of additional excluded directory basenames to add to Mega-Linter default excluded directories. They are excluded at any nested level.

Each item of this array must be:

root ADDITIONAL_EXCLUDED_DIRECTORIES items
Type: string

Example:

[
    "test"
]

root ANSIBLE_ANSIBLE_LINT_ARGUMENTS
Type: array of string

ANSIBLEANSIBLELINT: User custom arguments to add in linter CLI call

Each item of this array must be:

root ANSIBLE_ANSIBLE_LINT_ARGUMENTS items
Type: string

root ANSIBLE_ANSIBLE_LINT_DIRECTORY
Type: string Default: "ansible"

root ANSIBLE_ANSIBLE_LINT_DISABLE_ERRORS
Type: boolean Default: false

root ANSIBLE_ANSIBLE_LINT_FILE_EXTENSIONS
Type: array of string

Each item of this array must be:

root ANSIBLE_ANSIBLE_LINT_FILE_EXTENSIONS items
Type: string

root ANSIBLE_ANSIBLE_LINT_FILE_NAME
Type: string Default: ".ansible-lint.yml"

ANSIBLEANSIBLELINT: User custom config file name if different from default

root ANSIBLE_ANSIBLE_LINT_FILE_NAMES_REGEX
Type: array of string

Each item of this array must be:

root ANSIBLE_ANSIBLE_LINT_FILE_NAMES_REGEX items
Type: string

Examples:

"Dockerfile(-.+)?"

"Jenkinsfile"

root ANSIBLE_ANSIBLE_LINT_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE
Type: string

root ANSIBLE_ANSIBLE_LINT_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE
Type: string

root ANSIBLE_ANSIBLE_LINT_RULES_PATH
Type: string

ANSIBLEANSIBLELINT: Path where to find linter configuration file

root ANSIBLE_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE
Type: string

root ANSIBLE_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE
Type: string

root APPLY_FIXES
Type: array or string Default: "none"

'all' to apply formatting and auto-fixes of all linters, or a list of linter keys
Examples:

"all"

"none"

[
    "JAVASCRIPT_ES",
    "MARKDOWN_MARKDOWNLINT"
]

root DEFAULT_BRANCH
Type: string Default: "master"

The name of the repository default branch. Warning: In new github repositories, master branch is named main, so you need to override this value with main
Examples:

"master"

"main"

root DEFAULT_WORKSPACE
Type: string Default: "/tmp/lint"

The location containing files to lint if you are running as docker image

root DISABLE
Type: array

If DISABLE is set, the linters in the listed descriptors will be skipped

Each item of this array must be:

root DISABLE enum_descriptor_keys
Type: enum (of string)

Must be one of:

  • "ANSIBLE"
  • "ARM"
  • "BASH"
  • "C"
  • "CLOJURE"
  • "CLOUDFORMATION"

root DISABLE_ERRORS
Type: boolean Default: false

Flag to have the Mega-Linter complete with exit code 0 even if errors were detected.

root DISABLE_LINTERS
Type: array

root EMAIL_REPORTER
Type: boolean Default: true

Mega-Linter can send email with reports to given addresses. Please set EMAILREPORTER** variables if activated

root EMAIL_REPORTER_EMAIL
Type: string

Comma-separated list of recipient emails, that will receive reports

root EMAIL_REPORTER_SENDER
Type: string Default: "megalinter@gmail.com"

root EMAIL_REPORTER_SEND_SUCCESS
Type: boolean Default: false

Define to true if you want to receive reports by mail even when there is no errors or updated sources

Type: string Default: "smtp.gmail.com"

Type: string

root EMAIL_REPORTER_SMTP_PORT

root EMAIL_REPORTER_SMTP_USERNAME

root ENABLE
Type: array

If ENABLE is not set, all descriptors are activated by default. If set, all linters of listed descriptors will be activated by default

Each item of this array must be:

root ENABLE enum_descriptor_keys
Type: enum (of string)
Same definition as enum_descriptor_keys

Example:

[
    "BASH",
    "HTML",
    "JAVASCRIPT"
]

root ENABLE_LINTERS
Type: array

If ENABLE_LINTERS is set, only listed linters will be processed

Each item of this array must be:

root ENABLE_LINTERS enum_linter_keys
Type: enum (of string)
Same definition as enum_linter_keys

Example:

[
    "JAVASCRIPT_ES",
    "PYTHON_PYLINT"
]

root FILEIO_REPORTER
Type: boolean Default: false

If you don't use artifacts upload to read Mega-Linter reports, you can access them with an hyperlink to file.io. Important: Mega-Linter has no affiliation with file.io, but it's supposed to be secured, and only one download is available for a report (snapchat for files, basically)

Type: string

Regular expression defining which files will be excluded from linting

"(src/test)"

root FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE
Type: string

Regular expression defining which files will be processed by linters
Example:

"(src/)"

Type: enum (of string) Default: "INFO"

How much output the script will generate to the console. One of INFO, DEBUG, WARNING or ERROR.

Must be one of:

  • "INFO"
  • "DEBUG"
  • "WARNING"
  • "ERROR"

Type: boolean Default: true
